text: Brickellia ambigens is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to Lincoln County, New Mexico.Greene, Edward Lee 1898. Bulletin of the Torrey Botanical Club 25(3): page 118 description and commentary in English, as Coleosanthus ambigensGreene, Edward Lee 1898. Bulletin of the Torrey Botanical Club 25(3): plate 330, figures 3–4 line drawings of Brickellia ambigens as Coleosanthus ambigens; figure captions on page 124 ==References== ==External links== *photo of herbarium specimen at Missouri Botanical Garden, type specimen of Coleosanthus ambigens/Brickellia ambigens ambigens Category:Flora of New Mexico Category:Plants described in 1898
title: Brickellia ambigens
